close.invalidUser: I wasn't able to find the user. Did you change the channel topic?
close.deleting: This ticket will be deleted in 10 seconds...

blacklist.added: **{- user}** was added to the modmail blacklist.
blacklist.removed: **{- user}** was removed from the modmail blacklist.

open.noBot: You cannot open modmail tickets for bots.
open.exists: Looks like this user already has a ticket opened at {- channel}
open.blacklisted: {- user} is blacklisted from opening modmail tickets.
open.embed_description:
**A wild ticket has appeared!**
You've received a direct modmail from a staff member in {guild}. If you're wondering why this ticket was opened, wait until a moderator has contacted you through this ticket.
open.cantDM: This user doesn't accept direct messages or has blocked the bot. Unable to open the modmail.
open.opening: Opening a modmail ticket, please wait...

enum.base_description: All logging module channels are made as posts under this forum channel.
enum.mod_description: Sends the moderation case for a punishment when it is recorded.
enum.message_description: Triggered when a message was deleted, edited, or when a channel was purged.
enum.modmail_description: Triggered when someone creates, deletes a ticket, or when a user gets blacklisted.
enum.servergate_description: Triggered when a user joins or leaves the server.
enum.voice_description: Triggered when a user joins or leaves a voice channel.

modal.invalidChannel: Please provide a valid forum channel ID.

logs.noBase: Please set a base forum channel first.

enum.badwords_description: Triggered when a filtered word is sent in a channel. Click the button below to edit the filtered words.
enum.invites_description: Triggered when a Discord server invite is sent in a channel.
enum.largeMessage_description: Triggered when a huge message is sent in a channel
enum.massMention_description: Triggered when a user @mentions more than 4 people in a channel.
enum.massEmoji_description: Triggered when a user uses too many emojis in a single message.
enum.spam_description: Triggered when a user sends messages too quickly in a channel.
enum.capitals_description: Triggered when a user uses too many capital letters in a single message.
enum.urls_description: Triggered when a user sends a link of any type in a channel.

modal.invalidChannel: Please provide a valid text channel ID.

enum.developers_description: Developers have permissions to use the `/eval` command.
enum.appealLink_description: When a person gets banned from the server, the appeal link gets sent to them.
enum.memberRoleId_description: The member role is used for locking down channels and accessing the verification module.
enum.modmailCategoryId_description: Modmail tickets are created under this category.
enum.confirmation_description: Shows a confirmation message whenever a moderation command is used.

modal.invalidCategory: Please provide a valid category id in this server.
modal.invalidRole: Please provide a valid, and manageable role ID in the server.

enum.counts_description:
These counts are used to take automatic actions on users when they reach a number of warnings.
Ex - Timeout #1: How many manual warnings should a user acquire before they are placed on timeout for the first time? This also applies for the other options.
enum.durations_description:
These durations are used for automatic punishments that a user can receive after reaching a number of warnings.
Ex - Timeout #1: How long should the person be timed out for when reaching the first timeout goal? (You may set these goals using the ${command.utility.configure.moderation.enum.counts_name} option)
enum.defaults_description: The default values are used when a moderator doesn't enter their value whilst using a (/) command.
enum.reasons_description: The reasons are shown in specific command options as autocomplete to make moderation easier. The max length for a reason is 100 characters.

modal.invalidDays: The delete message days must be between 0 and 7.

verification.default_description:
This server requires verification before you can view all the channels, be a part of the server, and prove you are not a robot.

â€¢ Click the button below to get started!
verification.invalidChannel: The channel must be in this server.
verification.sent: The verification embed was sent to {- channel}
